title: 12 Reči
overview: A young lawyer with a troubled past gets a job in the office of a well-known Belgrade lawyer. He becomes a defense attorney in a major trial against a mob boss whose empire has been shaken. On the way to his ambition and progress in his legal career, he was drawn into the game of big capital, the hacker underground and black money flows. Faced with a personal crisis and with power structures, he will have to choose between loyalty and justice. The crime drama 12 Reči is a series about lawyers in the network of organized crime and the judiciary, where everything has a price except trust.
